headline.main: Police: Security Guard Fatally Stabbed at Virginia Mall
headline.print_headline: Police: Security Guard Fatally Stabbed at Virginia Mall

lead_paragraph: Police say a security guard at a northern Virginia mall has died after being stabbed by a suspected shoplifter who fled the scene.
snippet: Police say a security guard at a northern Virginia mall has died after being stabbed by a suspected shoplifter who fled the scene....
